1. 市面上唔夠貨
2. Covid 停產
3. Uranium future market near all real demand, not much speculator
4. Uranium 交易係枱地交易, e.g. 用十年合約方式去stabilize supply
5. Buyer (Nuclear plant) dont "much" fucking care Uranium price (insignificant to their over all cost)
6. 極難重新開採, 一開唔係聽日開, 後日關
依家spot price 係0開採價值, 除非價上, CCJ 上年重開了D 礦
7. 運輸, 存貨
8. 全世界都起nuclear plant
9 Carbon Tax
10 .... countless

<= 世界上無另一種商品咁撚inelastic
依家有班人(include mining company)發現張賭枱面唔夠貨
Buyer (Nuclear Plant) 會比 Seller (Mining) short squeeze
但班Buyer 其實無太大所謂 (insignificant to their over all cost)
跟住有班散戶就冲埋入去炒mining
炒炒下有個傻佬話搞trust, 散戶可以買trust squeeze 埋實貨一份
